scripts.test:user-management: newman run collections/01_User_Management.postman_collection.json -e configs/qa_postman_environment.json -g configs/workspace.postman_globals.json --reporters cli,htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export reports/user-management-report.html --reporter-htmlextra-title 'User Management API Tests' --bail
scripts.test:authentication: newman run collections/02_Authentication.postman_collection.json -e configs/qa_postman_environment.json -g configs/workspace.postman_globals.json --reporters cli,htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export reports/authentication-report.html --reporter-htmlextra-title 'Authentication API Tests' --bail
scripts.test:all: npm run test:user-management; npm run test:authentication
scripts.debug:files: echo 'Collections:' && ls -la collections/ && echo 'Configs:' && ls -la configs/
